name: Extinguished (itch) (lrdazrl)
description:
This game was made as part of Aalto University master level course Game Project. It was created during 5 weeks with a team of 6 persons with different backgrounds.

The original idea for the game was designed by Miro Aurela and a 3 minute presentation pitch for the concept was created together with Mark Laukkanen. In a voting among course members, our pitch was selected as the best and this project with the 4 follow-up projects were started. The team was selected among students inspired by the game concept. After forming the team, the concept was focused together to fit the available time span and the interests of the team member.

The goal of the project was to create a demo showing the potential of the game concept. It explores the possibilities of using total darkness both as a game mechanic and an atmospheric tool.

Team
